name: Power Disney Princess Simulator 5000
description:
Gather fuzzy friends! Fight the boss! Fight the boss again!


This is my first ludum dare game. The end result actually works(!), but the cats are a bit buggy sometimes. Use a-d to move, spacebar to jump, and click on critters to get a contextual menu.

Everything grows! Except you ;)
Hope you enjoy o/

WARNING: The web version has many more bugs than the downloadable release. I am working on fixes, but I cannot upload a new version until Ludum Dare voting is over. Please try the downloads if you have issues (mostly text and UI).
